Crisis Hotlines

* [National Suicide Prevention Lifeline](http://www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org/), [(800) 273-8255](tel:+1 800-273-8255)
* [American Association of Poison Control Centers](http://www.aapcc.org/), [(800) 222-1222](tel:+1 800-222-1222)
* [Veteran's Crisis Line](http://www.ptsd.va.gov/public/where-to-get-help.asp), ([800) 273-TALK (8255)](tel:+1 800-273-8255) or text 838255
* [Texas Addiction Recovery Centers](http://www.recovery.org/) [(844) 289-5140](tel:+1 844-289-5140)
* United Way Helpline  Dial 211 or 1-877-541-7905  [www.211texas.org](http://www.211texas.org)
